9. Abortion involves killing, but unplugging the violinist is merely refus-
ing to save.
It is obvious that some of the similarities and differences are notrelevant. It
does  not  matter  whether  killing  occurs  near  the  Earth.  Killing  is  usually
wrong, even on the starship Enterprise. It is also accepted that differences in
musical talent and in sex cannot justify killing. The other similarities
